name: noodle
content:
noodle noun
(FOOD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C usually plural ] a food in the form of long, thin strips made from flour or rice, water, and often egg, cooked in boiling liquid: egg/rice noodles instant/crispy noodles chicken noodle soup
Somchok Kunjaethong/EyeEm/EyeEm/GettyImages
[ C usually plural ] US pasta of any shape: The pasta recipes were very simple, using only noodles and some type of seafood. I ordered the hot sausage in a spicy Cajun sauce served over penne noodles.

noodle noun
(HEAD)
[ C ] US old-fashioned informal (UK noddle) the head or brain of a person: Did that hit you on the noodle? Use your noodle - clear the shelves before you paint the cupboard!

noodle noun
(FLOATING OBJECT)
[ C ] (also pool noodle) a light, cylinder-shaped object that floats on water and that you hold onto or put under your arms when you are learning to swim or exercising in the water: Using water weights, noodles, or even pool toys, you'll swim, jog, stretch and lift your way into better shape. A long foam pool noodle had somehow found its way into the back of the car, and was obstructing the rear window.
